sqlMap.select: SELECT id , datamodelid , columnename , columncname , columntype , columnlen , columnaccuracy , creationdate , remark FROM SpiderColumn
SELECT id , datamodelid , columnename , columncname , columntype , columnlen , columnaccuracy , creationdate , remark FROM SpiderColumn WHERE (id = #id#)
SELECT id , datamodelid , columnename , columncname , columntype , columnlen , columnaccuracy , creationdate , remark FROM SpiderColumn WHERE (datamodelid = #value#)
SELECT id , datamodelid , columnename , columncname , columntype , columnlen , columnaccuracy , creationdate , remark FROM SpiderColumn WHERE (columnename = #value#)
SELECT id , datamodelid , columnename , columncname , columntype , columnlen , columnaccuracy , creationdate , remark FROM SpiderColumn WHERE (columncname = #value#)
SELECT id , datamodelid , columnename , columncname , columntype , columnlen , columnaccuracy , creationdate , remark FROM SpiderColumn WHERE (columntype = #value#)
SELECT id , datamodelid , columnename , columncname , columntype , columnlen , columnaccuracy , creationdate , remark FROM SpiderColumn WHERE (columnlen = #value#)
SELECT id , datamodelid , columnename , columncname , columntype , columnlen , columnaccuracy , creationdate , remark FROM SpiderColumn WHERE (columnaccuracy = #value#)
SELECT id , datamodelid , columnename , columncname , columntype , columnlen , columnaccuracy , creationdate , remark FROM SpiderColumn WHERE (creationdate = #value#)
SELECT id , datamodelid , columnename , columncname , columntype , columnlen , columnaccuracy , creationdate , remark FROM SpiderColumn WHERE (remark = #value#)
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO SpiderColumn ( datamodelid , columnename , columncname , columntype , columnlen , columnaccuracy , creationdate , remark ) VALUES ( #datamodelid# , #columnename# , #columncname# , #columntype# , #columnlen# , #columnaccuracy# , #creationdate# , #remark# )
select LAST_INSERT_ID() as value
sqlMap.update: UPDATE SpiderColumn SET columncname = #columncname# , remark = #remark# WHERE (id = #id#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT id , datamodelid , columnename , columncname , columntype , columnlen , columnaccuracy , creationdate , remark FROM SpiderColumn WHERE (id = #id#)

SELECT id , datamodelid , columnename , columncname , columntype , columnlen , columnaccuracy , creationdate , remark FROM SpiderColumn WHERE datamodelid in (select datamodelid from TemplateDataModel where templateid = #value#)
